orders.protect.content: Club Factory will never ask for privacy information from our customers in any way.
orders.protect.detail:
Dear customer,
Recently some frauds disguised as Club Factory ask for your bank card information, transaction information, transfer records or other personal information.
Club Factory assures you that we will never ask for privacy information from our customers in any way. Please protect your personal information, and do not leak to any strangers.
Do not trust any CLUB FACTORY Customer Care Number released on the Internet. If you need any help, please contact online support within the app.

pay_success.protect.content:
Dear customer,
Recently some frauds disguised as Club Factory ask for your bank card information, transaction information, transfer records or other personal information.
Club Factory assures you that we will never ask for privacy information from our customers in any way. Please protect your personal information, and do not leak to any strangers.
Do not trust any CLUB FACTORY Customer Care Number released on the Internet. If you need any help, please contact online support within the app.
pay_success.protect.tips: Please do not contact any contact number posted outside Club Factory app/website. Club Factory will not be responsible for any loss caused by it.
